sentences.en: As you lie on your own death-bed you will be as mystified about UFOs as you are today.
sentences.cn: 当你躺在你自己临终的床上的时候，你仍将被不明飞行物所迷惑，就像你的今天被迷惑一模一样。

sentences.en: Chueh - hsin was mystified. " Which extra ? Who's started to fight? "
sentences.cn: “ 什么号外? 哪个打起来了? ” 觉新莫名其妙地说.

sentences.en: He mystified us all by pouring his drink out of the window.
sentences.cn: 他把饮料倒出窗外,使我们大为困惑.

sentences.en: His sudden disappearance mystified the police.
sentences.cn: 他的突然失踪使警方大惑不解.

sentences.en: I'm mystified ; I just cannot see how he did it.
sentences.cn: 我大惑不解,说不明白他是怎样做到的.

sentences.en: I'm mystified; I just can't see how he did it.
sentences.cn: 我大惑不解, 就是不明白他是怎麽做到的.

sentences.en: In this manner, AIDS appeared insidiously and mystified doctors and scientists alike.
sentences.cn: 就这样, 艾滋病不知不觉地出现在我们面前,使医师和科学家都感到迷惑.

sentences.en: She was genuinely mystified by her success.
sentences.cn: 她真的搞不懂自己为什么会成功.

sentences.en: She would easily be mystified, easily crushed.
sentences.cn: 她很容易受到蒙蔽, 受到摧残.

sentences.en: The audience must have been totally mystified by the plot.
sentences.cn: 观众一定是让剧情完全搞晕了。

sentences.en: The latter pair say they are mystified by what has unfolded.
sentences.cn: 后两者说他们对已经发生的一切困惑不解.

sentences.en: The magician's tricks mystified the audience.
sentences.cn: 那位魔术师的把戏使观众困惑.
男人们简直是迷离恍惚.

sentences.en: There was something strange in her attitude which mystified me.
sentences.cn: 她态度有些奇怪，让我迷惑不解。

sentences.en: They were totally mystified by the girl's disappearance.
sentences.cn: 那女孩失踪使他们大惑不解。

sentences.en: TYPICAL USE : The magician's tricks mystified the audience in the theatre.
sentences.cn: 那位魔术师的把戏使剧院里的观众困惑.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑
使迷惑（mystify的过去分词）；使难解

trans.tran_cn: 使（某人）困惑不解，使迷惑( mystify的过去式和过去分词 )
